Package demoworld.model

Class Character

Object
Character
public class Character extends Object
A representation of a characters state in a rpg game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Character(String name, RuleBook rulebook)
    Constructs a new Character with the given initial name and rulebook.

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character(String name, RuleBook rulebook)
      Constructs a new Character with the given initial name and rulebook.
      Parameters:
      name - the initial name for the character, which should be a String
      rulebook - the DemoWorld rulebook the character should refer to.

  • Method Details

    • getHitpoints

      public Hitpoints getHitpoints()
      Gets the Hitpoints Stat from the Character.
      Returns:
      reference to the Hitpoints Stat from the Character

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the character.
      Parameters:
      name - the string you want to set the character's name to

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the character.
      Returns:
      name of the character

    • getStat

      public EntryManager<Stat> getStat()
      Gets the EntryManager for the character
      Returns:
      reference to the characters EntryManager

    • getStatByName

      public Stat getStatByName(String name)
      Gets the Stat with the given name from the character.
      Parameters:
      name - name of stat looking for
      Returns:
      the Stat with the given name from the character.

    • getFeature

      public EntryManager<Feature> getFeature()
      Gets the EntryManager for the character
      Returns:
      reference to the characters EntryManager

    • getSpecialty

      public EntryManager<Specialty> getSpecialty()
      Gets the EntryManager for the character
      Returns:
      reference to the characters EntryManager

    • getExperience

      public Experience getExperience()
      Gets the characters Experience object
      Returns:
      reference to the Experience for the character

    • addSpecialty

      public void addSpecialty(Specialty specialty)
      adds a specialty to the character and adjusts the character based on that Specialty
      Parameters:
      specialty - the Specialty being added to the character

    • removeSpecialty

      public void removeSpecialty(Specialty specialty)
      removes a specialty and all related features from the character and unadjusts the character.
      Parameters:
      specialty - the Specialty being removed from the character
      See Also:
      • Specialty.unadjust(Character)

    • addFeature

      public void addFeature(Feature feature)
      adds a feature to the character if they do not already have it and adjusts the character based on that feature
      Parameters:
      feature - the Feature being added to the character

    • removeFeature

      public void removeFeature(Feature feature)
      removes a feature to the character and unadjusts the character based on that feature
      Parameters:
      feature - the Feature being removed from the character
      See Also:
      • Feature.unadjust(Character)

    • damage

      public void damage(int value)
      damages the character and then checks for death. any amount of damage may be supplied, but negative damage is not possible.
      Parameters:
      value - the amount of damage to be inflicted on the character
      See Also:
      • checkForDeath()

    • heal

      public void heal(int value)
      heals the character and then checks for death. any amount of heal may be supplied, but negative heal is not possible.
      Parameters:
      value - the amount of hitpoints to be healed
      See Also:
      • checkForDeath()

    • adjustXp

      public void adjustXp(int value)
      adjusts the characters Experience then check if the character should level up and reset the xp back to the mininum
      Parameters:
      value - the value to add to the characters current experience

    • toString

      public String toString()
      creates and returns a string representation of the characters current state
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the string representation of the characters current state
